TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyboardNavigation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可焦點化物件之間的邏輯巡覽和方向式巡覽。

span.span: Provides logical and directional navigation between focusable objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責實作其中一個瀏覽鍵按下時的預設鍵盤焦點瀏覽。The class is responsible for implementing default keyboard focus navigation when one of the navigation keys is pressed. 瀏覽鍵是： Tab、 Shift + Tab、 Ctrl + Tab、 Ctrl + Shift + Tab，UpArrow、 DownArrow、 向左鍵，和向右鍵。The navigation keys are: Tab, Shift+Tab, Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab, UpArrow, DownArrow, LeftArrow, and RightArrow keys. 邏輯巡覽的範例使用 tab 鍵將焦點移。An example of logical navigation is using the tab key to move focus. 方向巡覽的範例使用方向鍵，將焦點移。An example of directional navigation is using the arrow keys to move focus. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數目物件。The following example creates a with a number of objects. 附加的屬性設定為上。The attached property is set to on the . 這表示當使用 tab 鍵內變更焦點、 從每個項目會將焦點移和焦點到達最後一個項目會傳回第一個項目。This means that when focus is changed using the tab key within the , focus will move from each element and when the last element is reached focus will return to the first element. [!code-xaml[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationxaml)] [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)]
